node.title: In this Gold Coast school, lessons include cuddling this puppy
node.alt: Black cocker spaniel puppy sitting on top of a computer desk playing with a Christmas bon bon.
node.description: School students struggling with anxiety and depression say the introduction of a cocker spaniel named Luna has been life changing.
node.content:
["Gold Coast school students struggling with anxiety and depression say the introduction of a cocker spaniel\u00a0therapy puppy named Luna has been life changing.", "Greig Bradley, Varsity College's deputy head of school support and learning, had\u00a0the idea to bring a toilet-trained pet into the school's classrooms.", "It has been two weeks since the program started at the college's Wellbeing Centre\u00a0and \"Luna love\" has proved a runaway\u00a0success.", "\"We had a lot of students who were school refusing who have now been here every day. We have students who have significant anxiety and depression who come down and see her every day.", "\"She reads kids very well. She knows who needs that extra cuddle already at 12 weeks [of age].\"", "", "
Taking time out in Varsity College's Wellbeing Centre.(\u00a0ABC Gold Coast: Cathy Border)
", "Teachers have reported that lessons\u00a0are quieter and\u00a0better behaved when Luna is there, especially as the pup typically\u00a0goes to sleep or sits on a student's lap.", "\"We run her pretty hard in the lunch hour so she's pretty calm in session,\" Ms Bradley said.", "\"Not every dog is built for this job, to be around so many students.\"", "Luna was bred by a\u00a0staff member but\u00a0goes home to\u00a0the Bradley household each afternoon.", "", "
Luna with owner Greig Bradley.\u00a0\u00a0(ABC Gold Coast: Cathy Border)
", "
Puppy care contracts
", "The students were asked to agree\u00a0to puppy care contracts and respect the puppy-safe places, including an impressive puppy penthouse\u00a0where Luna can go\u00a0for alone time.", "Grade 7\u00a0student\u00a0Annastacia Stewart said having Luna has been a\u00a0life-changing experience.", "In her final stretch of school, grade 11\u00a0student Aimie Shields appreciates the cocker spaniel diversion.", "\"It's nice to come in and have some puppy cuddles to take your mind off homework and assessments,\" she said.", "One the places off-limits to Luna is the classrooms\u00a0of three students who have dog allergies.\u00a0", "", "
Luna's penthouse and \"safe\"\u00a0place.(\u00a0ABC Gold Coast: Cathy Border)
", "
Luna to have her own lessons
", "Staff regularly pop in for a Luna cuddle.", "\"One of my staff came in this morning and she was a bit\u00a0upset. Luna knew that she needed extra cuddles,\" Ms Bradley said.", "Luna will begin formal therapy training in March."]
